content: option. Players will then be able to choose their character's Race from nine different Races, along with a Subrace. Afterward, players will be able to choose from eleven different Classes, as well as other customization options for that class, if any, including the Subclasses. Players will then be able to choose three Skills in which their character will be proficient, aside from the ones granted by previous customization choices like their character's Background, Subrace, or Subclass.
